name: Background-Color Layer Intent
description: Background-color tokens encode visual layer intent. Each token family represents a specific visual layer in the UI hierarchy.

--ks-background-color-default.role: Page-level background — the base canvas of the application
--ks-background-color-default.rationale: Default background is the base canvas, not for elevated surfaces

--ks-background-color-card.role: Elevated card surfaces — cards, teasers, content blocks that sit above the page
--ks-background-color-card.rationale: Card background uses primary-alpha for subtle elevation above page level

--ks-background-color-interface.role: UI control surfaces — form inputs, selects, interactive controls
--ks-background-color-interface.rationale: Interface background uses fg-alpha for neutral control surfaces

--ks-background-color-primary.role: Primary brand-color surfaces — primary buttons, branded sections, CTAs
--ks-background-color-primary.rationale: Primary background is the brand color at full strength, use with --ks-text-color-on-primary for contrast

--ks-background-color-accent.role: Accent surfaces — subtle emphasis areas, highlighted sections
--ks-background-color-accent.rationale: Accent uses fg-to-bg blend for subtle surface differentiation

--ks-background-color-bold.role: Bold surfaces — strong visual emphasis, inverted sections
--ks-background-color-bold.rationale: Bold uses primary-to-bg blend for strong visual differentiation

--ks-background-color-clear.role: Transparent surfaces — elements that reveal the background behind them
--ks-background-color-clear.rationale: Clear is transparent by default, with interactive states that show subtle color on hover/active

--ks-background-color-positive.role: Positive/success state backgrounds — success banners, valid state indicators
--ks-background-color-positive.rationale: Semantic background for positive feedback states

--ks-background-color-negative.role: Negative/error state backgrounds — error banners, invalid state indicators
--ks-background-color-negative.rationale: Semantic background for negative/error feedback states

--ks-background-color-notice.role: Notice/warning state backgrounds — warning banners, caution indicators
--ks-background-color-notice.rationale: Semantic background for warning/notice feedback states

--ks-background-color-informative.role: Informative state backgrounds — info banners, helper backgrounds
--ks-background-color-informative.rationale: Semantic background for informational feedback states
